### **About this app**

#### This app was developed by [Junheng Zhao](https://github.com/zhaojhweb/). It is mainly used for gene co-expression analysis.

### **How to use this app**

#### First, you need to use any of the modules in the Cluster menu to process your expression data and eliminate outliers to ensure reliable results. 

#### The co-expression analysis is then performed using any of the modules in the NetWork menu. 

#### It's important to note that you'll need to read the prompts carefully to make sure that your input file format is read correctly.

### **Declaration**

#### The sample data in the software is sourced from the website [BarleyExpDB](http://barleyexp.com/). The results analyzed from the sample data are for demonstration purposes only and do not carry any research significance.
